column2: "Afei Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara baa David nkyɛn wɔ Hebron
column3: na wɔbɛkaa dɛ
column5: yɛyɛ wo biew na wo honam."

column2: "Mber a etwa mu asen no a Saul dzii hɛn do hen no
column3: ɔwo nye nyia ɔdze Israel kɔr sa na ɔdze hɔn sanee bae: na EWURADZE see wo dɛ
column4: Ɔwo na ebɛnyɛn me man Israel
column5: na ɔwo na ibedzi Israel do ɔpanyin."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na Israel mpanyimfo nyinara yɛaba ɔhen nkyɛn wɔ Hebron yi; na ɔhen David nye hɔn dzii ahyɛmu wɔ EWURADZE enyim wɔ Hebron; na wɔseraa David ngo hyɛɛ no hen wɔ Israel do."
"Aber a David hyɛɛ ase dzii hen no nna oedzi mfe eduasa
column3: na odzii hen mfe eduanan."

column2: "Odzii Juda do hen mfe esuon na abosoom esia wɔ Hebron: na odzii Israel na Juda nyinara do hen mfe eduasa ebiasa wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Da bi ɔhen David na ne mbarimba akofo no sii mu kɔr Jerusalɛm
column3: Jebusfo no do. Na asaase no do nkorɔfo no dween dɛ David runntum nnkɔ mu ntsi wɔkekaa mu guu no do dɛ
column5: mpo hɛn mu enyifurafo na mpakye no nnkotum hɔn."

column2: "Naaso David gyee Zion akoban no; a ɔnoara so nye David kurow no."
"David kaa kyerɛɛ no dɔm no da no dɛ
column3: Obiara a ɔpɛ dɛ oku Jebusfo no
column4: wɔmma ɔmfow nkɔ nsuka no ho
column5: na ɔnkɔbɔ dɛm mpakye na enyifurafo no. Hɔn a wɔtan David no. Dɛm ntsi na wɔsee dɛ
column6: enyifurafo na mpakye no runntum nnhɛn fie no mu no."

column2: "Na David tsenaa akoban no mu
column3: na ɔfrɛɛ no David kurow. Na David toow fasu hyiae fi Millo na no mu afamu."

column2: "Na David kɔr do yɛɛ kɛse ara; osiandɛ EWURADZE
column3: dɔm Nyankopɔn no dzii n'ekyir."

column2: "Na Taerehen Hiram tuu abɔfo ma wɔbaa David nkyɛn
column3: a wɔdze nkyindur ndua
column5: na abodwimfo: na wosii fie maa David."

column2: "Na David hun dɛ EWURADZE etsintsim no dze no ahyɛ Israel do hen
column3: na dɛ osian ne man Israel ntsi ɔama n'ahendzi do."

column2: "David fi Hebron bae no ekyir no
column3: ɔwarwaar nwewefo na yernom bi so fi Jerusalɛm: na hɔn so wɔwowoo mbabanyin na mbabaa."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔwoo hɔn wɔ Jerusalɛm no hɔn edzin nye yi; Sammua
column3: Sobab

column2: "Elisama
column3: Eliada

column2: "Na aber a Filistiafo tsee dɛ wɔasera David ahyɛ no hen wɔ Israel do no
column3: Filistiafo no nyinara sii mu kɔree dɛ wɔrokɔhwehwɛ David; na David tsee
column4: na osianee kɔr akoban no mu."

column2: "Nna Filistiafo no wɔaba abɛtserɛw hɔn mu wɔ Refaim bɔnsa no mu."
"Na David bisaa EWURADZE
column3: dɛ
column4: Ana momfow monkɔ Filistiafo no do a? Ana ibeyi hɔn ahyɛ me nsa a? Na EWURADZE see David dɛ
column5: Fow kɔ: na ampaara mibeyi Filistiafo ahyɛ wo nsa."

column2: "Na David baa Baal-perazim
column3: na David kunkum hɔn wɔ hɔ; na ɔsee dɛ
column4: EWURADZE atsew m'atamfo mu wɔ m'enyim
column5: dɛ nsu ntsewee. Dɛm ntsi ɔfrɛɛ bea no dzin dɛ Baal-perazim."

column2: "Na wɔdaan hɔn ehonyi no gyaa hɔ
column3: na David na ne mbarimba no fae kɔree."

column2: "Na Filistiafo no fowee baa bio
column3: na wɔdze hɔnho bɛtserɛɛw Refaim bɔnsa mu."

column2: "Na David bisaa EWURADZE no
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: Mma mmfow nnkɔ: Kɔ aprɔw kesi hɔn ekyir
column5: na bra hɔn do wɔ bakandua no ne tsentsendo."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ etse nantsew nka wɔ bakandua no etsifi a
column4: ɔno keka woho: osiandɛ nna EWURADZE epue dzi w'enyim dɛ orukoku Filistiafo dɔm no."

column2: "Na David yɛɛ dɛm
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no; na okunkum Filistiafo no fi Geba araa dze kodur dɛ edze rebɛba Gezer no."
